# hasComb

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the annotation divides the text widget’s bounds into equally spaced segments, such as in a form entry field.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasComb: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFAnnotation/maximumLength] property specifies the number of spaces the text widget divides the bounds into.

## Configuring Text Widget Annotations

- **isMultiline**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text widget annotation displays multiple lines.
- **isPasswordField**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text widget annotation displays a password field using bullet characters.
- **maximumLength**: The maximum number of characters the text widget annotation allows.
